title: Forced Robbery
desc:
Post 1365
- Take either 3 cards or leave up to 2 cards from the person who has the most cards, whichever leaves the person with the most cards.
- If the person with the most cards has 1 or 2 cards, you may discard this card and receive another one without costing you your turn.
- After 2 turns, give the person with the 2nd least cards 5 cards.
